sentences.english: They have just found a magnetite in this region.
sentences.chinese: 他们在这个地区刚刚发现一个磁铁矿。

sentences.english: The mixture of magnetite and quartz was separated by magnetic separation.
sentences.chinese: 磁铁矿和石英的混合矿样采用磁选分离。

sentences.english: The oxidation mechanism of Jidong magnetite pellets was studied.
sentences.chinese: 对冀东磁铁矿球团焙烧的氧化机理进行了研究。

sentences.english: Makeng Mining is now the largest single magnetite ore underground mine in China.
sentences.chinese: 马坑矿业已成为我国最大的单体井下磁铁矿。

sentences.english: Iron ores of greatest economic interest contain magnetite and hematite.
sentences.chinese: 安徽庐江龙桥铁矿属一大型隐伏磁铁矿矿床。

sentences.english: The analytical scheme of magnetite in iron ores by means of the chemical separation has been investigated.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了用化学分离法测定铁矿石中磁铁矿的方案。

sentences.english: Ancient Chinese people into contact with magnetite, as he began to understand the nature of magnetism.
sentences.chinese: 古代中国人接触了磁铁矿，开始了对磁性质的了解。

sentences.english: This is because the oxidation breaks down magnetite.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为氧化磁铁矿蜕变。

sentences.english: Panzhihua city lies in the upstream of Yangtze River, where possessing of the biggest Vanadium Titanivm magnetite in China.
sentences.chinese: 攀枝花市位于长江上游，拥有全国最大的钒钛磁铁矿。

sentences.english: Reasons of the skimmer damage when smelting V-bearing titanomagnetite at Panzhihua Iron and Steel Group are studied.
sentences.chinese: 分析了高炉冶炼钒钛磁铁矿炉前砂口损坏的原因。

sentences.english: There exists a certain kind of difficulty to smelt the vanadium-bearing titanomagnetite in a conventional blast furnace.
sentences.chinese: 利用普通高炉冶炼高钛型钒钛磁铁矿有很大的难度。

sentences.english: The Longqiao iron ore deposit is a large-scale hidden magnetite ore deposit.
sentences.chinese: 安徽庐江龙桥铁矿属一大型隐伏磁铁矿矿床。

sentences.english: Commercial test of separating Baima vanadium-bearing titanomagnetite was performanced.
sentences.chinese: 对白马钒钛磁铁矿进行了选矿工业试验。

sentences.english: The Damiao anorthosite complex is rich in vanadium titanomagnetite ore bodies.
sentences.chinese: 大庙斜长岩杂岩体中赋存有丰富的钒钛磁铁矿矿体。

definition: rutile (mineral form of titanium oxide TiO2)
